text: Like the Veterans Day table, our hearts gather loved ones near and far.
The warmth of Veterans Day embraces both present and absent hearts.
Veterans Day blessings connect us to those we hold dear, wherever they may be.
Like veterans' service, love guides us to those we miss.
The Veterans Day gathering welcomes both present guests and absent friends.
Like veterans' courage, our hearts reach for those who can't be here.
Veterans Day joy multiplies when shared with those we love and miss.
Like veterans' spirit, love reaches both near and far.
The Veterans Day spirit connects hearts across any distance.
Like veterans' sacrifice, love reaches those we can't embrace.
Veterans Day memories bridge the gap between present and absent loved ones.
Like veterans' honor, love carries thoughts to those far away.
The Veterans Day celebration nourishes both body and soul, near and far.
Like veterans' strength, love watches over those we miss.
Veterans Day peace embraces both present company and absent friends.
Like veterans' dedication, love brings light to absent hearts.
The Veterans Day spirit unites hearts across any distance.
Like veterans' legacy, love connects us to those far away.
Veterans Day joy is complete when shared with all we love.
Like veterans' spirit, love brings together all we hold dear.
